streams.name: SomaFM: Groove Salad
streams.genre: A nicely chilled plate of ambient/downtempo beats and grooves.

streams.name: SomaFM: Deep Space One
streams.genre: Deep ambient electronic, experimental and space music. For inner and outer space exploration.

streams.name: SomaFM: Space Station Soma
streams.genre: Tune in, turn on, space out. Spaced-out ambient and mid-tempo electronica.

streams.name: SomaFM: Groove Salad Classic
streams.genre: The classic (early 2000s) version of a nicely chilled plate of ambient/downtempo beats and grooves.

streams.name: SomaFM: Synphaera Radio
streams.genre: Featuring the music from an independent record label focused on modern electronic ambient and space music.

streams.name: SomaFM: Beat Blender
streams.genre: A late night blend of deep-house and downtempo chill.

streams.name: SomaFM: The Dark Zone
streams.genre: The darker side of deep ambient. Music for staring into the Abyss.

streams.name: SomaFM: Bossa Beyond (Special)
streams.genre: Silky-smooth, laid-back Brazilian-style rhythms of Bossa Nova, Samba and beyond

streams.name: SomaFM: Suburbs of Goa
streams.genre: Desi-influenced Asian world beats and beyond.

streams.name: SomaFM: Sonic Universe
streams.genre: Transcending the world of jazz with eclectic, avant-garde takes on tradition.

streams.name: SomaFM: Seven Inch Soul
streams.genre: Vintage soul tracks from the original 45 RPM vinyl.

streams.name: SomaFM: Fluid
streams.genre: Drown in the electronic sound of instrumental hiphop, future soul and liquid trap.

streams.name: SomaFM: cliqhop idm
streams.genre: Blips'n'beeps backed mostly w/beats. Intelligent Dance Music.

streams.name: SomaFM: SF 10-33
streams.genre: Ambient music mixed with the sounds of San Francisco public safety radio traffic.

streams.name: SomaFM: Dub Step Beyond
streams.genre: Dubstep, Dub and Deep Bass. May damage speakers at high volume.

streams.name: SomaFM: Tiki Time (Special)
streams.genre: Classic Tiki music and Vintage island rhythms to sip cocktails by.

streams.name: SomaFM: SomaFM Specials
streams.genre: Now featuring Afternoon Jazz, Wavepool, DubX, The Surf Report & More!

streams.name: SomaFM: Doomed
streams.genre: Where every day is Halloween: Dark industrial/ambient music for tortured souls.
